entry.title: Episode 001 - What Is DevOps?
entry.content:
Watch Now

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Check-outs

Panel

  • Matt Stratton github, twitter, irc: MattStratton, blog
  • Trevor Hess github, twitter

Outline

Matt and Trevor talk about the reason for Arrested DevOps, the format of the show (sort of), and then “what does DevOps mean?” Then somehow the topic devolves into open floorspaces and Matt puts his foot in his mouth a few times.

DevOps – the Title Match – John Vincent' blog post about what DevOps is and isn’t, that Matt totally read from and referred to.

Food Fight Show – The Podcast where DevOps chefs do battle. These guys totally watched this live. Which is more than I can say for The Ship Show. Just kidding.

Check-Outs

Matt

  • Ender’s Game
  • High West Whiskey Campfire

Trevor

  • Saints Row

Follow us on Twitter at @ArrestedDevOps.

Please feel free to submit show ideas to our github repo

entry.title: Episode 000 - Is This Thing On?
entry.content:
This episode is really not worth watching. Trust us on this. It’s not even an episode. Consider it our “Sprint Zero” to prep for the first one, to make sure all our infrastructure is working.

Or you can just listen!
